about_the_game:
Gameplay Overview
The story is set in a city overrun by zombies. As the last survivor, you are driven to the brink by hordes of zombies. Use barricades as your final defense line and engage in a desperate battle against the endless zombie waves to protect your survival!

Key Features

  • Diverse Weapon Choices: From shotguns and submachine guns to revolvers, pistols, sniper rifles, Molotov cocktails, and grenades—arm yourself with a variety of weapons to combat the zombie hordes.

  • Cover-Based Combat: Zombies will prioritize attacking your barricades. Strategically use cover to enjoy the thrill of standing alone against countless zombies.

  • Rich Upgrade System: Defeat zombies to earn coins, which can be used to enhance your weapon power or physical attributes, giving you the edge in battle.

  • Zombie Swarm Assault: Over time, zombies will swarm like a tide, continuously invading your stronghold. Despite standing alone, you have unlimited ammunition at your disposal—fire away without worrying about running out of bullets!
